newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Baoshi 96 net hits 83 mln yuan.
newsitem.headline: Baoshi 96 net hits 83 mln yuan.

text.p: China's major black-and-white television tube maker Shijiazhuang Baoshi Electronic Co Ltd reaped net profits of 82.47 million yuan in 1996, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange said in a notice after the market closed on Friday.
Earnings per share were 0.215 yuan in 1996 and turnover reached 530.93 million yuan, the exchange said.
It did not specify whether the results were compiled under Chinese or international accounting standards and gave no comparative figures.
In 1995, the company posted net profits of 170.17 million yuan on turnover of 516.93 million yuan based on international accounting standards.
The firm's board of directors proposed a cash dividend of 0.13 yuan per share based on 1996 profits, the exchange said.
Trading in the company's A and B shares will be suspended on Monday morning and will resume that afternoon, it said.
